vclaim: Actress Phylicia Rashad tweeted of Bill Cosby's release from prison: "FINALLY!!!! A terrible wrong is being righted — a miscarriage of justice is corrected!"
title: Did Phylicia Rashad Celebrate Cosby’s Prison Release in a Tweet?
subtitle: The former actress on "The Cosby Show" tweeted: "FINALLY!!!! A terrible wrong is being righted — a miscarriage of justice is corrected!"
author: Jordan Liles
